name: Waste Management & Sanitation
text_for_embedding: Reports regarding garbage collection, littering, sewage issues, vermin infestations, illegal dumping, or other sanitation concerns that affect the cleanliness and hygiene of the community.

name: Water Supply & Drainage
text_for_embedding: Reports regarding water supply issues, water quality complaints, pipe leaks, clogged drains, flooding, or other concerns affecting the availability and flow of water in the community.

name: Electricity & Street Lighting
text_for_embedding: Reports about power outages, faulty electrical lines, broken streetlights, or other electrical issues that impact public safety and convenience.

name: Public Infrastructure & Facilities
text_for_embedding: Reports about roads, bridges, public buildings, sidewalks, street signs, and other infrastructure or facility issues that require maintenance or repair.

name: Transportation & Traffic Management
text_for_embedding: Reports related to traffic congestion, improper parking, damaged traffic signs, pedestrian hazards, or other transportation issues affecting mobility and safety.

name: Community Amenities & Environmental Concerns
text_for_embedding: Reports about parks, playgrounds, tree planting, green spaces, minor pollution, and other environmental or recreational issues that affect community well-being.

name: Public Health & Safety (Non-Emergency)
text_for_embedding: Reports concerning non-life-threatening health issues, minor accidents, pest problems, or other concerns affecting residents' safety and public health.

name: Animal & Veterinary Concerns
text_for_embedding: Reports about stray animals, livestock management, veterinary services, animal welfare, or minor animal-related hazards in the community.

name: Public Order & Minor Disturbances
text_for_embedding: Reports regarding noise complaints, vandalism, minor conflicts between residents, and other non-criminal disturbances affecting community order.

name: Social Welfare & Accessibility
text_for_embedding: Reports about access to social programs, public services for vulnerable populations, facilities for the elderly or disabled, or other community welfare concerns.

name: Governance & Transparency Reports
text_for_embedding: Reports concerning government service efficiency, civic engagement, public resource management, or transparency issues that residents want to flag to authorities.
